name: Memos
short_description: Open-source Markdown notes app, with a UI styled like a social feed.
description: Open-source Markdown notes app, with a UI styled like a social feed. Memos is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, tools, network, social. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Memos on your home server to open-source markdown notes app, with a ui styled like a social feed without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Memos to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
